formatted_address: 8 Changi Business Park Avenue 1, #01-51 & #02-51, ESR BizPark@Changi, Singapore 486018
name: FairPrice Xtra Changi Business Park

reviews.text:
What a spacious FairPrice store is this! It offers good discounts on the grocery, juices, chocolates, vegetables, fruits and many things.
With Christmas coming in, they already had many things to sell at discounted prices.
Do not forget to buy FairPrice Guava Juice if you love to drink juices.
Also, it has direct connectivity with Expo MRT and that's the best thing I liked.

Very big supermarket in Changi with a good selection of everything üëç I was always able to bring some food back home for my loved ones and my friends. It's of course also good to fill up the fridge in the hotel for the time you are here. I'll be back soon
One stop for almost all household stuff. More variety and choices. Convenient to the Expo MRT.

Good place to do groceries. It‚Äôs two floors worth of supermarket and a 4D outlet at the 2nd floor.

Also, the place has all the necessities so it serves its multi purpose for the whole household.

Vegetables looks fresh too.

Very crowded on weekends and Friday night. Office hour lunch time is pretty packed too on weekdays.

I can advised family with children, please hold their hands. Kids were running(!) and i  seen 3 almost near crashes with shopper's trolley.
And also, when the isle is crowded with people, please do not bring or try to force your way in for the trolleys, leave it at the side!

Nontheless, big supermarket 2 storey.

vicinity: 8 Changi Business Park Avenue 1, #01-51 & #02-51, ESR BizPark@Changi
